Instruction: Peel the carrots and cut them into sticks.
In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.
Add the apricot preserves to the saucepan and stir until melted and bubbly.
Add the carrot sticks to the saucepan, stirring to coat them with the apricot glaze.
Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the carrots are tender-crisp.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot as a sweet and savory side dish.
